name: Superior Room - 2 people / 30m²
description: The generous living room area with couch can accommodate one extra bed. While sitting on lounge chairs of the south-facing balcony, you can enjoy the stunning views of the Matterhorn, some fresh mountain air and the mild afternoon sun.
title: Superior Room
subTitle: More than meets the eye
subTitle3: Our Services and wonders of Prague
description2: See-through delicate embroidered organza blue lining luxury acetate-mix stretch pleat detailing. Leather detail shoulder contrastic colour contour stunning silhouette working peplum. Statement buttons cover-up tweaks patch pockets perennial lapel collar flap chest pockets topline stitching cropped jacket.
roomFeatures: Wired and wireless broadband Internet access
